name: Downfall Caves
description:
Hi guys,

this is my first game made in Unity3D. It's a simple "rogue like" dungeon game where you must find the key for the closed door leading to the treasure.

This project gave me a lot of knowledge in gamedevelopment and I'am very proud that I will finish that at an very final state. So I can conentrate at new things and learning more and more.

You can download a first Proof of Concept here. Have fun playing it :)

Best regards, your Michael
